experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
responsibilities: Conducted comprehensive secondary research on emerging digital marketing trends and consumer psychological triggers.
Synthesized data from multi-channel industry reports to identify shifts in target audience demographics.
Assisted in the design and distribution of quantitative surveys to evaluate brand perception and recall.

experience.title: Market Research Project Participant
responsibilities: Performed a competitive analysis of regional e-commerce players to identify gaps in market positioning.
Gathered and organized qualitative data from focus groups to support a thesis on social media engagement strategies.
Utilized data visualization techniques to present research findings on consumer purchasing behavior to faculty panels.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
